import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import Item from 'src/app/models/item'; import { Service } from 'src/app/services/service'; import { ChangeDetectionStrategy, ViewEncapsulation } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-items', templateUrl: './items.component.html', styleUrls: ['./items.component.css'], }) export class ItemsComponent implements OnInit { public items: Item[] = []; constructor(public service: Service, private fb: FormBuilder) {} itemForm = this.fb.group({ name: ['', [Validators.required]], description: ['', [Validators.required]], price: ['', [Validators.required]], isShared: [false], }); onSubmit(): void { this.handleAddItem(); } handleAddItem() { let item!: Item; item.name = !!this.itemForm.value.name ? this.itemForm.value.name! : ''; item.description = !!this.itemForm.value.name ? this.itemForm.value.name! : ''; item.price = !!this.itemForm.value.name ? this.itemForm.value.name! : ''; item.isShared = !!this.itemForm.value.name ? this.itemForm.value.name! : ''; item.isPayedOff = false; item.name = !!this.itemForm.value.name ? this.itemForm.value.name! : ''; item.name = !!this.itemForm.value.name ? this.itemForm.value.name! : ''; this.service.addItem(item).subscribe({ next: () => { this.itemForm.reset(); this.loadingService.setLoading(false); this.toastr.success('Successfully updated information.', 'Success!'); this.router.navigate(['/']); }, error: (err) => { this.toastr.error('An unknown error occurred', 'Something went wrong'); this.loadingService.setLoading(false); }, }); } ngOnInit(): void { this.service.loadItems().subscribe({ next: (res) => { console.log(res); res.forEach((c: any, index: number) => { if (index !== 0) { console.log(c); this.items.push(c); } }); }, }); } }
